title: Student Recruitment Officer Job at Phillips Outsourcing Limited
content:
Phillips Outsourcing Limited has been in existence for over 16 years. We have a vast experience in the outsourcing business as we currently manage resources for major clients in all sectors of the Nigerian economy. In addition, our prolific manpower cuts across the 36 states in Nigeria. After successfully gaining ground in all the 36 states of the federation, we are gradually spreading our tentacles to other African Nations. We are currently registered to also do business in Ghana. Our framework is developed to fully support the businesses of our clients, ensuring continuous improvement of the outsourced services. This ultimately thrusts our clients to achieve their business objectives.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Student Recruitment Officer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are hiring energetic and result-driven Student Recruitment Officers to join our Lagos team.
	The ideal candidates will excel at engaging prospective students, promoting study opportunities, and driving enrollment growth through effective outreach and advisory support.


Key Responsibilities


	Engage prospective students and provide accurate information on available study programs
	Handle inquiries, follow up with leads, and convert prospects into enrolled students
	Assist students with application processes and required documentation
	Promote the institution through online and offline channels
	Represent the company at fairs, school visits, and promotional events
	Maintain strong relationships with students, parents, and partner institutions
	Prepare and submit periodic reports on recruitment activities and conversions.


Requirements


	Minimum of 1 year of experience in student recruitment, sales, or advisory roles
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to meet targets and work independently
	Good organizational and follow-up skills
	Familiarity with international study pathways is an added advantage.


Remuneration
Competitive and based on experience.

Method of Application 
Interested candidates should send their CV to: jobsbykyin@gmail.com using "Student Recruitment Officer – Lagos" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Data Analytics Officer",
  "description": "Polaris Bank was established by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) on September 21, 2018 to offer commercial banking services to the Nigerian public. The bank commenced services on the same day, having purchased the assets and assumed certain liabilities of the defunct Skye Bank.With a footprint of over 350 branches across the country, Polaris Bank prides itself in delivering exceptional customer experience, leveraging best in class/state of the art Information Communication Technology (ICT). By focusing on ICT solutions across multiple service delivery channels (mobile banking, ATMs, POS and online platforms) Polaris Bank maintains a pivotal role in the Nigerian banking industry, providing customers with simple, convenient and secured banking services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Data Analytics Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Department:&nbsp; Retail Banking

Job Description


	The Data Analytics Officer will be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting large datasets to provide actionable insights that drive business decisions.
	The role will support&nbsp;strategic initiatives by leveraging data to improve operational efficiency, enhance customer&nbsp;experience, and inform product development.??


Key Responsibilities


	Collect, clean, and validate data from multiple sources to ensure accuracy and reliability.
	Perform statistical analysis and develop dashboards, reports, and visualizations to communicate insights effectively.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify data-driven opportunities for process improvement and business growth.
	Develop predictive models and apply machine learning techniques to support forecasting and trend analysis.
	Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and provide recommendations based on data insights to optimize business strategies.
	Ensure compliance with data governance, privacy, and security standards.
	Stay updated on emerging analytics tools, technologies, and best practices to enhance analytical capabilities.

Data Analytics Officer Job at Polaris Bank




        
    

        
        Polaris Bank was established by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) on September 21, 2018 to offer commercial banking services to the Nigerian public. The bank commenced services on the same day, having purchased the assets and assumed certain liabilities of the defunct Skye Bank.With a footprint of over 350 branches across the country, Polaris Bank prides itself in delivering exceptional customer experience, leveraging best in class/state of the art Information Communication Technology (ICT). By focusing on ICT solutions across multiple service delivery channels (mobile banking, ATMs, POS and online platforms) Polaris Bank maintains a pivotal role in the Nigerian banking industry, providing customers with simple, convenient and secured banking services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Data Analytics Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Department:  Retail Banking

Job Description


	The Data Analytics Officer will be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting large datasets to provide actionable insights that drive business decisions.
	The role will support strategic initiatives by leveraging data to improve operational efficiency, enhance customer experience, and inform product development.??


Key Responsibilities


	Collect, clean, and validate data from multiple sources to ensure accuracy and reliability.
	Perform statistical analysis and develop dashboards, reports, and visualizations to communicate insights effectively.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify data-driven opportunities for process improvement and business growth.
	Develop predictive models and apply machine learning techniques to support forecasting and trend analysis.
	Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and provide recommendations based on data insights to optimize business strategies.
	Ensure compliance with data governance, privacy, and security standards.
	Stay updated on emerging analytics tools, technologies, and best practices to enhance analytical capabilities.


Requirements
Qualification and Experience


	Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Economics, or related field; advanced degree or certifications in analytics is a plus.
	Minimum of 3–5 years of experience in data analysis, business intelligence, or related roles.
	Proficiency in SQL, Python/R, and data visualization tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau).
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail.
	Experience with big data platforms and cloud-based analytics solutions is an advantage.
